message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. To kick things off, I'm offering it to you at $2,300,000. I believe this price reflects the true value this product holds.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $1,200,000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $1,200,000 is significantly below its true market value. To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $1,950,000.
I understand Alice's position, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet her current offer. I would like to propose an offer of $1,600,000 for the product.
